title: The Whispering Shadows at Old Fort
details: While visiting the Old Fort with friends at night, I heard faint whispers near the ruins. There was no one around, but the sound kept circling us for a few minutes before suddenly stopping.

title: Ghostly Figure on the Highway
details: Driving late at night, I saw a figure in white standing in the middle of the road. I hit the brakes, but the figure vanished instantly. Dashcam showed nothing unusual.

title: Footsteps in the Abandoned Hospital
details: Exploring an old hospital building, we heard footsteps echoing down the hallway. Every time we stopped to listen, the sound stopped too — as if someone was matching our pace.

title: Unseen Presence in My Apartment
details: For a week straight, I’d wake up to my TV turned on and my balcony door open. Security footage only showed flickering lights at 3:07 AM every night — no one entered or left.

title: Voices in the Forest
details: While camping with friends, we heard clear human voices calling our names from deep within the forest. When we followed the sound, it kept shifting direction until it completely stopped.
